property.value: Search your deck for up to 4 tactics. Put them into your discard pile.

property.name: Text

property.name: Text
property.value:

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE CRYPTIC ATHENAEUM
[O][O][O]: At the start of your turn, you may draw a card. If you do, an opponent may draw a card.
[O][O][O][O][O]: At the start of your turn, an opponent discards a card.
[O][O][O][O][O][O][O]: At the start of your turn, you may pick a character. If you do, put it into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Look at an opponent's hand and choose a non-resource card in it. Put it into play under that opponent's control as a face-down resource.

property.value:
CORRUPT

property.name: Text
property.value:
At the start of your turn, you may pick a character. If you do, put a token on it.
All characters lose 1 strength, 1 life, and 1 speed for each token on them.

property.name: Text
property.value:

EFFECT: Put the tactic into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
At the start of each player's turn, that player chooses one of the following:
OPTION 1: Each player draws a card. Each player puts a card from their hand on the bottom of their deck.
OPTION 2: Each player puts a resource they control into its owner's hand. Each player may play a resource.
OPTION 3: Each player discards a card.
OPTION 4: Each player puts a card from their hand on the top of their deck.
